definition: an irregular arrangement of patches of color, colour with streaks or blotches of different shades
details:
noun
- an irregular arrangement of patches of color
= example: an irregular arrangement of patches of color
verb
- colour with streaks or blotches of different shades
= synonyms: dapple
- mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
= synonyms: streak
